front.title: Associating a DoH Server with a Resolver

abstract.t: Browsers and web applications may want to know if there are one or more DoH servers associated with the DNS recursive resolver that the operating system is already using. This would allow them to get DNS responses from a resolver that the user (or, more likely, the user's network administrator) has already chosen. This document describes a protocol for a resolver to tell a client what its associated DoH servers are.
